QuestData.Title: A Mother's Worries
QuestData.Description: My son Gimlok's the light of my life. It warms my heart to see him playin' with the other children.$B$BI can't help but worry, though. There's sharks not but a few feet away in the bay. If it's deep enough for one to swim its way here...$B$BI can't bear it! Please, you're clearly one $r that's seen tougher situations than us townsfolk. Would you get rid of those nasty sharks for me? At least a few?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, bless your heart, to do such a thing for a married woman like me. You're too kind.
